Text: Thanks for this autobiography by a great actor who we better know as Hercule Poirot.The fact that its read by him gives us a sense of nearness to him,as if we are sitting huddled near a fire on some cold wintery day,and Sir Peter Ustinov narrating his life to us from the sofa....as if in a Agatha Christie climax and the murderer is about to be revealed.
Saw him at congregation Durham Uni when he was elderly but he was really entertaining even then.
